list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a paid position of regular employment.
a task or piece of work, especially one that is paid.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the car was a blue malevolent-looking job
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chiếc xe là một công việc có vẻ độc ác màu xanh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of prodding, thrusting, or wrenching.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she jobbed as a waitress until her first role in a movie

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: buy and sell (stocks) as a broker-dealer, especially on a small scale.
turn a public office or a position of trust to private advantage.
